item.title: Adele - Send My Love - Key of C
item.description:
Send My Love To Your New Lover by Adele. It’s been lowered by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele players can play along. Chord used: C and Am. The lyric video was created and posted by YouTuber Lyrics and More, I simply added the chords. For educational use.
You could also play along with boomwhackers or handbells or guitar or most any instrument that can make a C chord and an A minor chord.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
